title: Her Texas Cowboy Brothers -
description: [Menage Erotic Sci-Fi Cowboy Menage a Quatre Romance, F/M/M/M, sex toys] Twenty-four year old Sabine Vincenzi is a successful businesswoman. Living a life of luxury, she has everything except the one thing she craves the most—sexual excitement. As a Sybar woman she needs to connect with a Sybar man to become complete. Zane Deveraux runs the fetish club Lucifer’s. He hopes to attract the elusive Sybar female, believing that they are naturally drawn to the darker side of sex. When Sabine hears rumours that a Sybar male is running the club, she is unable to resist. There she meets gorgeous thirty-five year old club owner Zane Deveraux. He introduces her to his equally gorgeous brothers, Hunter and Kaden. All three are alpha Sybar males, and cowboys to boot! Can the three brothers give Sabine everything she desires? Or will their overwhelming Sybar powers prove too much for even her to handle? ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Sabrina Sinclair
